features: Hydrate with a burst of freshness with this tea tree mint scalp conditioner Blended with peppermint and tea tree oil, the moisturizing conditioner invigorates with a refreshing tingle on the scalp
HYDRATE, MOISTURIZE and REFRESH: This 13-fluid ounce bottle of OGX Hydrating plus Tea Tree Mint Conditioner helps nourish and balance hair while leaving it feeling moisturized and soft
STIMULATE THE SENSES: Designed to invigorate and leave hair feeling strong, the nourishing mint conditioner alsoleaves hair feeling deliciously fresh with a long-lasting clean

HAIR CARE INSPIRED BY NATURE: Blended with Australian tea tree oil, which helps invigorate the scalp for a healthy look and feel as well as milk protein to help smooth and strengthen hair and peppermint oil for a refreshing tingle on the scalp

IRRESISTIBLY DELICIOUS SCENT: The sweet peppermint, iced vanilla and tea tree scent leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell with every wash Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle on your tresses
body.description: Hydrate with a burst of freshness with this tea tree mint scalp conditioner Blended with peppermint & tea tree oil, the moisturizing conditioner invigorates with a refreshing tingle on the scalp.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. Hydrating + Teatree Mint Conditioner When a conditioner infused with Australian tea tree oil meets milk proteins and micro-infused peppermint oils, you have an energizing blend that leaves your hair giddy with full-body shine. A unique blend of Australian tea tree oils, milk proteins and micro-infused peppermint. Helps to strengthen and moisturize while bringing balance to scalp. Three-in-one treat in one refreshing formula. Helps to stimulate each strand and wake up your senses. Sulfate free surfactant hair care system.

Benefits, Ingredients, Hair Types, Regimen Benefits Strong and soft? That’s a refreshing thought. Infused with Australian tea tree oil and milk proteins, it helps to moisturize and strengthen your mane. Micro-infused with peppermint oils, it helps to stimulate each strand and wake up your senses. Ingredients An ultra hydrating blend with Australian tea tree oil, milk protein, and peppermint oil helps to add moisture and strength. Nourish your hair for hydration and balance. Hair Types This product is good for everyday use, works well with most hair types. *Fine *Thick *Oily *Frizzy Regimen For best results, use our entire Tea Tree collection to help with every day moisture. After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly and get ready to wake up your senses!

OGX Hydrating + Teatree Mint Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Teatree Mint Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Teatree Mint Scalp Treatment OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Conditioner OGX 5-in-1 Keratin Smoothing Oil Conditioner Hair Type All Hair Types All Hair Types All Hair Types Fine / Flat Frizz-Prone Hair Goal Hydration + Balance *Remove Scalp Buildup Without Stripping Refreshes Scalp *Fuller-Looking, Healthier-Looking Hair Tame Frizz, Humidity Protection, Strengthen + Shine Key Ingredient Teatree Oil + Peppermint Oil + Milk Protein Teatree Oil + Peppermint Extract + Witch Hazel Teatree Oil + Peppermint Extract + Witch Hazel Biotin + Collagen + Bamboo Fiber Extract Keratin Protein + Argan Oil + Ceramides Scent Sweet Peppermint, Tea Tree + Iced Vanilla Sweet Peppermint, Tea Tree + Iced Vanilla Sweet Peppermint, Tea Tree + Iced Vanilla Bergamot, Jasmine + Vanilla Golden Amber, Tropical Orange + Madagascar Vanilla Contains Sulfates? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Dandruff or Head itching!
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell, tea tree and peppermint; it helps with static during the winter and I have less split ends or hair damage when I use this conditioner. It's a very decent price and because of "Subscribe and Save" it automatically ships to me every two months! I can easily change date if I need more/less! Great Seller, Great Product, No Issues! : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo works wonders for me. My hair is quite thick and can be difficult to get shampoo out. This works so well that I don’t need a conditioner. However, the shampoo worked so well I bought the conditioner and am very pleased with both! With this shampoo I don’t need to shampoo my hair as often. This is a light, refreshing shampoo. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this conditioner.. it smells so good and it's super refreshing... My hair usually gets weighed down easily by conditioners but not with this one.. it keeps my hair conditioned without being heavy... I can use it every day with no problems and it's super light... I have very fine hair... Not much hair at all.. this is the only conditioner I've found that works for my hair type..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells good. Scalp appreciates this shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mint smell
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice conditioner that is light and it makes my hair soft and it smells good too. The mint smell is not overwhelming, I will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice smell and good ingredients but left my hair feeling heavy and sticky. Too bad.I wanted to like this product. I have fine, thin hair. May be good for thicker, courser hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo Cleans hair
reviews.reviewText: Great product to use on natural hair! Renotta’s Hair
Good,feels cool bsz of mint , after wash hairs feels softWriting review again after 1 month of useFeels good, hairs love itPlanning to order again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Prefer the shampoo and conditioner to the other kind, nice and minty.
My hair is usually dry and frizzy, but this makes it so soft
Amazing product. This is my third but from this brand. Worth it.
